group.name: openSUSE-Slowroll-community-repos
group.summary: Additional repositories for openSUSE Tumbleweed from the openSUSE community

repository.name: Packman Repository
repository.description: Packman build software packages to enable users to easily install and remove software on Linux. More specifically, they do so for software that is not shipped as part of distributions or that are shipped as an outdated version.

repository.name: Packman Essentials Repository
repository.description: Packman build software packages to enable users to easily install and remove software on Linux. More specifically, they do so for software that is not shipped as part of distributions or that are shipped as an outdated version. This "essential" subset of the Packman Repository only includes multimedia codecs, and therefore reduces the risk of package conflicts but also reduces the packages available.

repository.name: nVidia Graphics Drivers
repository.summary: Repository providing proprietary nVidia graphics drivers
repository.description: After adding the repository run 'zypper inr' or an online update, and the correct drivers should get installed. Reboot afterwards.
